menu.name: Modifiers
menu.desc: Modifiers to spice up the game!

menu.name: Easy Modifiers
menu.desc: Modifiers that can help you out!

checkbox.name: Practice Mode
checkbox.desc: If checked, you cannot die no matter what.

checkbox.name: Botplay
checkbox.desc: If checked, a cpu will play the game for you! Note: If playing coop mode, this modifier will automatically be set off!

menu.name: Neutral Modifers
menu.desc: Modifers that can either help you or make the game harder depending on how you're setting them.

menu.name: Scroll Speed
menu.desc: Options for the Scroll Speed modifier!

menu.name: Playback Rate
menu.desc: Options for the Playback Rate modifier! The higher the number, the faster the song will go.

number.name: Playback Rate
number.desc: Change the playback rate! The higher, the faster the song will go by.

checkbox.name: Change Midsong
checkbox.desc: If checked, the playback rate will be changeable mid song by using the keys Q and E.

menu.name: Health Gain
menu.desc: Options for the Health Gain modifier! Multiplies your amount of health gain.

menu.name: Challenging Modifers
menu.desc: Modifers that makes the game harder!

menu.name: Health Drain
menu.desc: Options for the Health Drain modifier! Health will get drained down as time goes on. Note: If playing coop mode, this modifier will automatically be set off!

menu.name: Earthquake
menu.desc: Options for the Earthquake modifier! It will shake your screen endlessly

menu.name: Sea Sick
menu.desc: Options for the Sea Sick modifier! Your camera will be swinging very weirdly for the entire song.

menu.name: Trampoline
menu.desc: Options for the Trampoline modifier! If checked, the hud will start bouncing!

checkbox.name: Mirror Camera
checkbox.desc: If checked, the camera will be mirrored.

checkbox.name: Poison
checkbox.desc: Enables the poison modifier. Once you miss, you get poisoned for the rest of the song. Missing more will make the poison worse. Note: If playing coop mode, this modifier will automatically be set off!

checkbox.name: Invisible Player Notes
checkbox.desc: If checked, the player's notes will be invisible. Better use your memory for this one! Note: If playing coop mode, this modifier will automatically be set off!

checkbox.name: Instant Death on Miss
checkbox.desc: If checked, missing a note will instantly kill you. Note: If playing coop mode, this modifier will automatically be set off!

checkbox.name: Sicks Only
checkbox.desc: If checked, having any rating other than sicks will instantly kill you. Better be careful on hitting your notes! Note: If playing coop mode, this modifier will automatically be set off!
